mapper.select: SELECT C.LOCATION_NO, B.TITLE , C.RECRUITS_NUM , C.RECRUITS_CURR FROM CARPOOL C JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN UPPER_CATEGORY UC ON UC.CATEGORY_U_NO = B.CATEGORY_U_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND UC.CATEGORY_U_NO = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARPOOL(BOARD_NO , RECRUITS_NUM , RECRUITS_CURR , LOCATION_NO , PRICE , START_TIME , END_TIME , ORIGIN , DESTINATION) VALUES(#{boardNo} , #{recruitsNum} , #{recruitsCurr} , #{locationNo} , #{price} , #{startTime} , #{endTime} , #{origin} , #{destination})
